description.en-UK: Edible Roots/tubers from the plant classified under the species Ipomoea batatas (L.) Lam., commonly known as Sweet potatoes. The part consumed/analysed is not specified. When relevant, information on the part consumed/analysed has to be reported with additional facet descriptors. In case of data collections related to legislations, the default part consumed/analysed is the one defined in the applicable legislation.£https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sweet_potatoes£https://www.google.co.uk/search?tbm=isch&q=Sweet potatoes
